snippet: For flower lovers traveling to the Netherlands, this is a special year: The Floriade horticultural expo, which only comes around every decade, runs until Oct. 7 in Venlo, in the southeastern part of the country.
abstract: For flower lovers traveling to the Netherlands, this is a special year: The Floriade horticultural expo, which only comes around every decade, runs until Oct. 7 in Venlo, in the southeastern part of the country.

headline.main: In the Netherlands, 100 Gardens and More, in a Once-a-Decade 'Theater of Nature'
